name: .TT2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .TT2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: TT2 files are not meant to be opened. However, since the TT2 file stores data for a TrueType Font TTF file you can rename the .tt2 file extension to .ttf, then open it with a program that supports TTF files, such as FontForge (multiplatform) or Apple Font Book (Mac). Or you can simply delete the TT2 file since it contains duplicated data from a TTF file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
